mapper.select: SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.FREE_NO, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.CREATE_DATE, A.HIT,A.USER_NO, A.STATE, A.IP, A.MODIFY_DATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FREE_NO DESC) AS ROW_NUM, FREE_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, HIT, ,USER_NO ,STATE, IP, ID,MODIFY_DATE, FROM FREE) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE (FREE_NO,TITLE, CONTENT,CREATE_DATE, HIT,USER_NO,STATE,IP,MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (FREE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{freeTitle}, #{freeContent}, SYSDATE, 0,#{userNo},0, #{writerIp}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO IMAGE (IMAGE_NO,LOCAL_BOARD_NO,SPO_REVIEW_NO,FREE_NO, FILESYSTEM) VALUES (#{imageNo}, #{LOCAL_BOARD_NO}, #{spoReviewNo}, freeNo, #{fileName})
